Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo scored 32 points on 24 shots, dominating the game.
Adebayo hit his first three three-pointers of the season.
Miami Heat led by as much as 20 points during the game.
Washington Wizards had an 11-2 run in the first half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jimmy Butler scored 18 points on 13 shots, showing an effective mid-range jumper.
